controller

Class TournamentController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.TournamentController

  • public class TournamentController
extends java.lang.Object
    this method is for the control of the Tournament mode
    Author:
    Yann Kerichard, Yueshuai Jiang, Che-Shao Chen

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private CardExchangeView cardExchangeView
      the data for card exchange view, it shows how many and what kind of the card of a player has

      Number of games played on each map
      private Map map
      The current map of the game
      private java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> maps
      The maps selected for the tournament
      private MapView mapView
      the data of map view that shows the map to the users
      private int maximumTurns
      Maximum number of turns for each game
      private Phase phase
      data of phase changes, 4 kind of phases included
      private PhaseView phaseView
      the data that should show in the phase view to the users
      private int playerNumber
      Player number
      private java.util.ArrayList<Player> players
      The players of the tournament
      private java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> winners
      To store the winners of each game
      private WorldDominationView worldDomiView
      data of the world domination view, it shows the data of players in the map who owned the most country and army

      • startUpPhase

        private void startUpPhase()
        This method deals with deploying players and armies on the map when the game just start. The deployment of each player with countries is randomly deployed. The deployment will end until every country have an owner.

      • reinforcementPhase

        private void reinforcementPhase(Player p)
        This method collects all the inputs in the reinforcement phase.
        Parameters:
        p - The current player that is in the reinforcementPhase

      • attackPhase

        private void attackPhase(Player p)
        This method collects all the inputs in the attack phase by calling views. The player can choose origin and destination, and armies number. Origin and destination countries must be connected.
        Parameters:
        p - The current player that is in the fortificationPhase

      • fortificationPhase

        private void fortificationPhase(Player p)
        This method deals with the logic of the fortification phase. The player can choose origin and destination, and armies number. Origin and destination countries must be connected.
        Parameters:
        p - The current player that is in the fortificationPhase

        public void initMap()
        To create / reset the map
